title: 2D Metroidvania game
shortDescription: 2D action adventure game created using C# and DirectX
longDescription: This is a 2D Metroidvania game that is a passion project between me and a friend. We have been working on it for a couple years but only on our off time.

title: JawlessBOT
shortDescription: Discord Bot with media and administrative features
longDescription: JawlessBot is a verified Discord bot that allows for playing media in voice calls, basic administrative actions such as banning, kicking, and warning users, and other fun commands. It is hosted using AWS and in continuous development since March 2024.

title: OpenGL TileMapEditor
shortDescription: OpenGL Application for creating tile-based maps
longDescription: This OpenGL tile map editor is designed for creating 2D grid-based tile maps. It was created to learn OpenGL and help develop a game. The project is no longer being worked on.

title: Swift HTTP
shortDescription: Swift package created for making HTTP requests easy
longDescription: This Swift package simplifies making HTTP requests. It was created to reduce code repetition in different Swift projects. It will be made public once stable.

title: FormatX -> Go
shortDescription: React Native Expo app for manipulating PDF files
longDescription: FormatX -> Go is a mobile frontend for FormatX, a tool for merging, splitting, and converting PDFs. It allows users to manipulate PDFs on mobile. Currently in active development.

title: Swift Memory Game
shortDescription: Swift iOS application for a memory game
longDescription: A native iOS memory card game where players must match identical cards within limited attempts. Includes a leaderboard. Not completed or in development.

title: JawlessBOT - Website
shortDescription: Website containing info and menus for JawlessBOT
longDescription: Website hosting the privacy policy and terms for JawlessBOT, hosted on GitHub Pages. Future updates will add server-specific bot options.

title: Sir Roland's Tower Quest
shortDescription: Python text-based RPG remake of an old project
longDescription: Sir Roland's Tower Quest is a text-based RPG based on my grade 11 final project, rebuilt with improved code and design.

title: DeepSeek Discord Bot
shortDescription: Discord bot for talking with a local DeepSeek Ollama instance
longDescription: A Discord bot that connects to a local DeepSeek instance via Ollama, allowing chat-based interactions through Discord commands.

title: Smart Crafting Display
shortDescription: Minecraft 1.21 Forge Mod featuring an item overlay
longDescription: Smart Crafting Display is a Minecraft Forge mod that adds an overlay showing required crafting materials and progress. Still in active development.

title: Pokemon Brick Bronze Auto
shortDescription: Python app automating legendary Pokémon captures
longDescription: This Python program automates capturing legendary Pokémon by identifying encounters and responding accordingly. Uses PyTorch and webhooks.

title: Jordle
shortDescription: Wordle clone with new game modes and leaderboards
longDescription: Jordle is a Discord-based Wordle clone featuring leaderboards, difficulty modes, and free-play options. Built with the Discord Embedded SDK.

title: My Portfolio Website
shortDescription: This website showcasing my work and resume
longDescription: My portfolio website containing details about me, projects I’ve built, and my resume. You’re currently viewing it!

title: Payulator
shortDescription: Web and mobile app for managing shared expenses
longDescription: Payulator is a full-stack expense management tool using a C# backend and a React Native frontend built with Expo. Designed for group expense tracking.
